title: IHC disposes of petition seeking details of cases against former AJK PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 08 (APP):The Islamabad High Court (IHC) on Wednesday disposed of a petition seeking details of cases registered against former prime minister of Azad Kashmir Sardar Tanveer Ilyas.
Justice Muhammad Azam Khan heard a petition seeking details of cases registered against Sardar Tanveer Ilyas.
DSP Legal Sajid Cheema, while presenting a report in the court, said that two cases have been registered against Sardar Tanveer Ilyas in Islamabad.
Assistant Attorney General Raja Zamiruddin, FIA and police officials also appeared in the court. After the report was presented, the court disposed of the petition.
